name: linsys-v

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: LINSYS_V: Verified Solution of Linear Systems

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Intel MPI Library is a multifabric message-passing library that
implements the open-source MPICH specification. Use the library to
create, maintain, and test advanced, complex applications that perform
better on high-performance computing (HPC) clusters based on Intel
processors. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and using this software,
you agree to the terms and conditions of the software license agreements
at https://intel.ly/393CijO.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
Arm Performance Libraries provides optimized standard core math
libraries for high-performance computing applications on Arm processors.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
Arm Performance Libraries provides optimized standard core math
libraries for high-performance computing applications on Arm processors.

dependencies.name: scalapack
dependencies.description:
Intel oneAPI Math Kernel Library (Intel oneMKL; formerly Intel Math
Kernel Library or Intel MKL), is a library of optimized math routines
for science, engineering, and financial applications. Core math
functions include BLAS, LAPACK, ScaLAPACK, sparse solvers, fast Fourier
transforms, and vector math. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and
using this software, you agree to the terms and conditions of the
software license agreements at https://intel.ly/393CijO.
